dt2.8:0.2_0: The reciter of the Monastic Code
dt2.8:1.1_0: What many things are always yoked in the various orders of form, up with shoulders and slowstead?
dt2.8:2.4_0: and thoughts known by the mind.
dt2.8:2.6_0: Descorted by those qualities, why many shoulders drawn into the aggregates?
dt2.8:3.2_0: Then the life of name and form
dt2.8:3.4_0: and two on both sides can’t find anyone.
dt2.8:4.6_0: buying your house, he chaffed himself with needle cases.
dt2.8:5.1_0: Eight pulled by paths of peace.
